english.segment1: Under open skies I leave the day behind. Wonder in my eyes, the world feels so alive. I just speak Your name and my heart seems to change. God of truth and grace, I can only praise You.
english.segment2: And the stars are singing out. the glory of Your wonderous love. Heaven's reaching down. to show me all that you have done for me
english.segment3: Healer of my heart, come burn away the dark. Under soft twilight, I can hear your voice tonight
english.segment4: Your name is higher than the Heavens. Your glory fills a million skies. Your heart is reaching down from heaven. and my soul cries out to you
